channel.title: 音乐 on Styline-天空橋

item.title: “会将两人逐渐包裹啊、瑠璃色的地球”
item.description: 契机 几年前看完「打ち上げ花火、下から見るか？横から見るか？」对其中女主唱的歌印象挺深，叫「瑠璃色の地球」。后来心血来潮看了几集叫「ひとりキャ

item.title: Love Minus Zero & Streets of London
item.description: 注：此文原为notion上发布 Love Muis Zero 歌词（部分摘录） In the dime stores and bus stations People talk of situations Read books, repeat quotations Draw conclusions on the wall Some speak of the future My love she speaks softly She knows there’s no success like failure And that failure’s no success at all
